>>52339589
You're going to want to emulate or if you really really fucking need to play on console for some reason use a flash cart.
Emulators are trivially easy on PC and I'm sure you can get one working on your phone if for whatever reason PC gaming isn't acceptable.
In fact it's better on emulator as you can forcibly inject events that you are over a decade late on to get the premiere experience.

A flash cart should work for your DS lite for things gen 5 and back, but would require a minimum of technical knowledge of how to work it and like 30 dollars.
You'll need to look that up a seller and how to work it on your own, but it shouldn't be harder than a couple google searches.

If budget were no issue I'd just tell you to hack a 3ds, but that's around $300 for the right kind unless you get really lucky.
